name: Dragones Rocks
preparation:
All you need to enjoy Casa Dragones Blanco is a twist of lime, lemon or grapefruit. When you have 100 percent pure blue agave tequila, no mixers are required.

Pour tequila into a rocks glass with one large cube.

Express the oil from a citrus twist (lime, orange or grapefruit), and drop in the twist to garnish.
